DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the long-term effects of catheter ablation procedures performed at the OU Medical Center.
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Follow-Up of Patients Undergoing Catheter Ablation
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to assess the long-term effects of catheter ablation procedures performed at this institution, including recurrence of the ablated arrhythmia and any late complications.
DOC.criteria: Undergoing catheter ablation at the OU Medical Center Prisoners Refusal to participate
